Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:14:15 +0000 Some menopausal women feel blindsided by a decision to switch the supplier of hormone replacement patches, a doctor says. Photo / 123rf
Elevated levels of arsenic detected in Waikato River affecting Auckland and Waikato water supplies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/elevated-levels-of-arsenic-Detected-in-waikato-river-affecting-auckland-and-waikato-water-supplies/FLLHFHG6F5HSPCHY66RF7WNCMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/elevated-levels-of-arsenic-Detected-in-waikato-river-affecting-auckland-and-waikato-water-supplies/FLLHFHG6F5HSPCHY66RF7WNCMU/ Benjamin PlummerArsenic is a substance found in rock that can be deadly if consumed in large amounts. Black Power’s Michael Hutchinson first in New Plymouth to appear on gang insignia ban charge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/black-powers-michael-hutchinson-first-in-new-plymouth-to-appear-on-gang-insignia-ban-charge/HOIO4ZFFYZBUZNNPDWLSQ2Y6YU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/black-powers-michael-hutchinson-first-in-new-plymouth-to-appear-on-gang-insignia-ban-charge/HOIO4ZFFYZBUZNNPDWLSQ2Y6YU/ Tara ShaskeyPeople wearing insignia from at least six different gangs are currently before the courts. Warkworth School’s musical bell system sparks stoush https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/warkworth-schools-musical-bell-system-sparks-stoush/NL56JAOW4BH3RBX3DPEMSBDRJY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/warkworth-schools-musical-bell-system-sparks-stoush/NL56JAOW4BH3RBX3DPEMSBDRJY/ The principal says students' learning, attendance and behaviour have improved. Photo / Supplied
Fatal Waikato bus crash: State Highway 1 blocked, one dead as emergency services, helicopters respond https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/state-highway-1-crash-in-waikato-emergency-services-responding/G35ESX5VTZDXHIITQAXPEMJZVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/state-highway-1-crash-in-waikato-emergency-services-responding/G35ESX5VTZDXHIITQAXPEMJZVI/ Seven ambulances and five helicopters responded. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 05:56:00 +0000 Both Auckland Westpac Rescue Helicopters were tasked to transport patients to Auckland City Hospital. Westpac 2 helicopter transported a female patient in her teens in a serious condition. Westpac Helicopter 3 transported a male patient in his 40s in a serious condition. Photo / Auckland Rescue Helicopter Trust

Christopher Tean Salt guilty of murdering Tofi Matagi in Mt Roskill, Auckland bar attack https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/christopher-tean-salt-guilty-of-murdering-tofi-matagi-in-mt-roskill-auckland-bar-attack/NC64YFDCVNFCZCM3QEU6YAFXKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/christopher-tean-salt-guilty-of-murdering-tofi-matagi-in-mt-roskill-auckland-bar-attack/NC64YFDCVNFCZCM3QEU6YAFXKM/ Craig KapitanChris Salt claimed his victim was a deportee who had a gun. He was wrong. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 05:23:47 +0000 A CCTV still from Richardson’s Bar and Restaurant in Mt Roskill, Auckland, shows Christopher Salt, left, and Tofimua Matagi playing darts together shorly before Salt fatally assaulted him. The footage has been played for jurors at Salt's High Court at Auckland murder trial. Photo / Supplied
Waikato: Wel Networks staffer left critically injured after botched drug money plan https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wel-networks-staffer-left-riticly-injured-after-botched-drug-money-plan/LSX3RCD7YZGDJILUV6DH4VERWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wel-networks-staffer-left-riticly-injured-after-botched-drug-money-plan/LSX3RCD7YZGDJILUV6DH4VERWU/ Belinda FeekJason Wharekura maintains he doesn't know his co-offenders, despite his guilty plea. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Adam Battensby's co-offenders Jason Wharekura and Trident Brewer were both jailed when they appeared for sentencing in the Hamilton District Court on Tuesday. Photo / 123rf
